name: Dice Crawler (ParanoidSyntaxError)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Roll dice to attack monsters in the randomly generated dungeons. Locate the stairs to progress to the next dungeon. Killing monsters has a chance to drop their dice. Every dice has an alignment cost, either toward CHAOS or ORDER. Max out either CHAOS or ORDER, and find the portal to ascend and win the game!

CONTROLS

W - Move forward

A/D - Turn

Enter - End turn

Space - Interact

Left Mouse - Drag dice to use

CREDITS

Programming - ParanoidSyntaxError

Music - highenergyimpulsenoise

Works best on a 1920x1080 screen
